code: import{USER_SET_USER,USER_SET_LOADING,USER_SET_ERROR}from"../types/actions/user";export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user,password){console.log(user);console.log(password);if(password==="test"){console.log("correct");return function(dispatch){dispatch(setUser(user));};}console.log("Wrong password");};export var setUser=function setUser(user){return{type:USER_SET_USER,user:user};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(){var loading=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;return{type:USER_SET_LOADING,loading:loading};};export var setError=function setError(){var error=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;return{type:USER_SET_ERROR,error:error};};
